title: Unable to pair Pixel 3 with Avantree CK11 handsfree bluetooth unit
content:
I am trying to connect my pixel 3 to the Avantree CK11 handsfree bluetooth speaker but every time I select the CK11 device from the availabe devices list on the Pixel 3, the Pixel says:  "Can't communicate with Avantree CK11".  The CK11 connects just fine with other Android phones and iPhone.

My Pixel is up to date:  Android 11, October 5th 2020 security update.
